channel.title: Status.php doesn't show on HTML!
channel.description: I have done this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,362433.20.html It's for a custom server status. Everything works if I try to go on it with http://mysite.com/status.php But now, I want to put it on my homepage so I do but the image doesn't show! How can I fix this please ? Thanks.

item.title: Status.php doesn't show on HTML!
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][code]

<?php $ip = $CONF['serverIP']; $port= $CONF['serverPort']; if (! $sock = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $num, $error, 5)) { echo $CONF['offline']; echo "
"; echo $CONF['serverName']; echo $CONF['status']; echo $CONF['statusD']; } else { echo $CONF['online']; echo "
"; echo $CONF['serverName']; echo $CONF['status']; echo $CONF['statusU']; } ?>

[/code]

Variables used:

[code]
//basic settings of the status checker
$CONF[‘serverName’]=‘TestScape’;
$CONF[‘serverIP’]=‘moparisthebest.com’;
$CONF[‘serverPort’]=‘80’;

//manages the images
$CONF[‘online’]=’’;
$CONF[‘offline’]=’’;

//simple text version of the status
$CONF[‘status’]=’ is currently: ';
$CONF[‘statusU’]=‘Online
’;
$CONF[‘statusD’]=‘Offline
’;[/code][/quote]

Nvm im so dumb

Read full topic

item.title: Status.php doesn't show on HTML!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

What…

<img src="http://www.mysite.com/image.jpg" />

You need to directly link to the image, not the page.
http://www.w3schools.com/html/html_images.asp

Read full topic

item.title: Status.php doesn't show on HTML!
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Well, I need something like “Your server is currently: ONLINE!” and “ONLINE!” would be a small picture.

I don’t want a page for only status checker.

Read full topic

item.title: Status.php doesn't show on HTML!
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I have done this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,362433.20.html

It’s for a custom server status.
Everything works if I try to go on it with http://mysite.com/status.php
But now, I want to put it on my homepage so I do but the image doesn’t show!

How can I fix this please ?
Thanks.

Read full topic
